name: Locked?
description:
Upon returning home from a long day at work a man whom many simply call "The Guy" is just ready to turn in for the night. While making dinner a mysterious figure approaches him from behind. The Guy awakes to find himself trapped inside of an old abandoned hospital. Despite his nickname, The Guy is very much a coward, but if he hopes to survive he'll need to gather the small bits of courage he has and start opening some doors. But...hold on, it's locked...? 

This game is made for Windows computers, working on creating new files for Mac and IOS systems.
